FpEllerEsForside.Title: Parental benefits or one-time grant?
FpEllerEsForside.Innhold: This guide is for those who want to know if they are entitled to parental benefits and/or a one-time grant.
FpEllerEsForside.FpErstatte: Parental benefit must replace your income when you have to be at home with the child in connection with birth or adoption.
FpEllerEsForside.EsEngangssum: Lump sum benefit is a one-off you can get if you are expecting a child and have had no income for at least 6 of the last 10 months.
SituasjonSide.ArbeidEllerNav: Are you an employee, freelancer, self-employed or do you receive payments from Nav?
SituasjonSide.HvaGirRett.EnAvDisse: If you receive one of these payments from Nav, you may be entitled to parental allowance:
SituasjonSide.HvaGirRett.Omsorgspenger: Care or accomodation fees for a sick child
SituasjonSide.HarDuHattInntekt: Have you had income in 6 of the last 10 months?
SituasjonSide.HarDuHattAndeInntektskilde: Do you have other sources of income?
SituasjonSide.AndreInntektskilder: Some other sources of income may affect the court on parental benefits
SituasjonSide.AndreInntektskilderDetalje: Work abroad, final package or remuneration and first-time service are sources of income that can affect parental benefits.
SituasjonSide.LønnFørSkatt: Approximately how much do you earn per month before tax?
SituasjonSide.HvorMyeMåHaTjent: How much must I have earned this year?
SituasjonSide.HvorMyeMåHaTjentDetaljer: To be eligible for parental benefit, you must earn at least {minstelønn} per year. You may be entitled to lump sum benefit if you have not earned so much.
SituasjonSide.MåVæreMedlem: To be entitled to parental benefit or lump sum benefit, you must be a member of the National Insurance Scheme
SituasjonSide.IkkeMedlem: You have stated that you do not live or work in Norway. Thus, it may be that you are not a member of the public insurance, which you have to be in order to get support from Nav. There are some cases where you live abroad, but still are a member of the public security. You can read more about this on NAV’s websites about public security.
SituasjonSide.MåTjeneMinst: To be entitled to parental benefit, you must earn at least {minstelønn} NOK a year
SituasjonSide.OppgittLønnIkkeRett: You have stated that you earn approximately {årslønn} in the year before tax, which is less than {minstelønn} in the year before tax. It therefore appears that you are not entitled to parental allowance. You may still be entitled to a lump sum benefit.
SituasjonSide.JobbetMinst6av10: To be entitled to parental benefit, you must have worked 6 out of the last 10 months
SituasjonSide.JobbetMinst6av10Detaljer: You must have worked 6 of the last 10 months before you go on leave to be entitled to parental benefit. You may still be entitled to a lump sum benefit.
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.DuHarRett: You are entitled to parental benefit
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.DuKanHaRett: You may be entitled to parental benefit
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.DuHarRettFpEll: You are entitled to parental benefit or single benefit
You can choose between single benefit or parental benefit
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.DuHarRettPåEs: You are entitled to a lump sum benefit
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.DuKanHaRettPåE: You may be entitled to a lump sum benefit
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.DuHarIkkeRett: It looks like you are not entitled to parental benefit or lump sum benefit
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.DuHarIkkeRettN: It looks like you are not entitled to parental benefit or lump sum benefit in Norway
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.SidenDuIkkeJob: You may be entitled to financial support equivalent to parental allowance in the country where you work. You must contact the relevant authority in the country where you work to find out more.
You are not entitled to a lump sum benefit if you are not a member of the National Insurance Scheme.
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.BasertPåSvaren: Based on the monthly salary you provided, your parental benefit will be approximately {utbetaling} NOK per month before tax, if you take 100 % parental benefit. The number of months is shared between the father and mother, and will vary if you choose 100 % or 80 % parental benefit.
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.HvaErFp.KanVel: You can choose between 49 weeks with 100 % parental benefit or 59 weeks with 80 % parental benefit..
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.KanOgsåHarRett: When you are entitled to parental benefit, you may also be entitled to lump sum benefit. Usually, it will pay off to choose parental benefit. You can only choose one of the benefits and you cannot change your mind.
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.DuFårUtbetaltE: With a lump-sum benefit, you will receive a one-off of {engangsstønad} NOK.
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.EsSkalBidra: A one-time grant is meant to help cover some of the expenses associated with having a child. The grant is a one-off of {engangsstønad} NOK.
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.SøkOmEs: Apply for a lump sum benefit
OppsummeringFpEllerEsSide.MerOmEs: More about a lump sum benefit
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.HvorforHarJegRett: Why am I entitled to parental benefit?
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.HvorforKanJegHaRe: Why might I be entitled to parental benefit??
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.HvorforHarJegIkke: Why am I not entitled to parental benefit?
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.HvorforHarJegRett: Why am I entitled to a lump sum benefit?
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.HvorforKanJegHaRe: Why might I be entitled to a lump sum benefit?
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.HvorforHarJegIkke: Why am I not entitled to a lump sum benefit?
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.OppfylleKrav: In order for you to be entitled to parental benefit, you must meet {erFlereKrav, select, true {these requirements} other {this requirement}}:
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.OppfylleKravEs: In order for you to be entitled to a lump sum benefit, you must meet {erFlereKrav, select, true {these requirements} other {this requirement}}:
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.DuMåHaInntekt: You must have had income for 6 of the last 10 months
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.DuHarOppgittInnte: You have stated that you have {harHatt, select, true {} other {not }}had income 6 out of the last 10 months.
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.DuMåTeneOver: You must earn, on average, at least {minstelønn} in the year before tax
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.DuHarOppgittMåned: You have stated that you have an average monthly salary of {månedslønn} before tax, which is {hvorMye, select, true {more} other {less}} than {minstelønn} in the year
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.DuMåVæreMedlem: You must be a member of the National Insurance
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.OppgittAtDuBorINo: You have stated that you {borINorge, select, true {live} other {work}} in Norway. We therefore assume that you are a member of the National Insurance Scheme.
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.FarEllerMedmor: Your situation as a father or co-mother must apply to at least one of these cases
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.HvisDuErFarEllerM: If you are the father or co-mother of the child, you may in some cases receive a lump sum benefit. It may apply to these cases:
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.AdoptererAlene: for each child you adopt alone
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.OvertarOmsorgMorD: you take over or have parental responsibility for the child when the other parent dies. You must have had less interactions with the child than what is called normal interactions (barnelova § 43).
you take care of the child when the mother dies in connection with the birth or caregiving. The lump sum benefit cannot already be paid to the mother.
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.Innen56Uker: you have taken over the care of the child within 56 weeks after the child was born or adopted, with the aim of taking over parental responsibility alone.
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.DersomEtAvTilfell: If one of these cases applies to you, you may be entitled to lump sum benefit.
HvorforHarJegRettPanel.IkkeMedlem: You have stated that you do not live or work in Norway. Thus, it may be that you are not a member of the public insurance, which you have to be in order to get support from Nav. There are some cases where you live abroad, but still are a member of the public security. You can read more about this on NAV’s websites about public security.
KravinfoBoks.DuIkkeMestSannsynligOppfyll: You probably do not meet this requirement
valideringsfeil.lønn.ikkeTall: You have typed something that is not a number
valideringsfeil.lønn.desimaler: You have typed too many decimals. Type a number with the maximum of 2 decimals
